title: Client Chat
body:
Anyone elses chat been acting funny laterly? 
When ever i send a message to someone it always appears above the message they sent me. Anyone else having this same problem?

replies.body: already notified them of this, they don't seem to give a hoot

Yeah i know, it makes it wierd to read right?
Also, i have a friend and whenever he is in game it ALWAYS says he is playing Olaf. Despite never playing Olaf before.
way to hard to have a conversation with anyone

Thanks for the heads up - I've not been able to get this to happen myself yet, but if you are able to see it consistently, the best place to post this will be in the "Report a Bug" forum (in the nav bar on the left).

Cheers!
Mindstar
Its fucked up like everything else in this season. Riot have managed to fuck the whole game in 1 patch
